use_cases.title: Create Task
use_cases.description: A user creates a new task in the task management app, including task details such as title, description, and due date.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to create tasks

main_flow.step: User enters task title and description

use_cases.postconditions: Task is created and displayed in the task list
use_cases.business_value: Allows users to create new tasks and prioritize their work

use_cases.title: Assign Task
use_cases.description: A user assigns a task to another user in the task management app, including assigning task details such as due date and responsible user.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to assign tasks

main_flow.step: User enters responsible user and due date

use_cases.postconditions: Task is assigned to the responsible user and displayed in their task list
use_cases.business_value: Enables collaboration and task delegation among team members

use_cases.title: Prioritize Task
use_cases.description: A user prioritizes a task in the task management app using AI-powered algorithms, including selecting task priority and due date.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to prioritize tasks

main_flow.step: User selects priority and due date

use_cases.postconditions: Task is prioritized and displayed in the task list with updated priority
use_cases.business_value: Improves task management and reduces task complexity

use_cases.title: View Task Details
use_cases.description: A user views task details in the task management app, including task title, description, and due date.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to view task details
use_cases.postconditions: Task details are displayed and user can take actions
use_cases.business_value: Provides users with task information and enables them to take actions

use_cases.title: Delete Task
use_cases.description: A user deletes a task in the task management app, including deleting task details such as title and due date.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to delete tasks
use_cases.postconditions: Task is deleted and displayed as deleted
use_cases.business_value: Removes unnecessary tasks and improves task management

business_requirements.overview: The Task Management App is designed to provide a comprehensive task management system for teams, enabling collaboration, task delegation, and task prioritization.
business_goals: Enhance collaboration and communication among team members
Reduce task complexity and improve task management
success_criteria: Task creation and assignment rates increase by 30%
User satisfaction with task management app increases by 25%
Task complexity and management improve by 20%
constraints: Limited budget for development and maintenance
Technical constraints due to integration with existing systems
assumptions: Users will have permission to create and assign tasks
Users will have permission to prioritize tasks
risks: Limited user adoption due to complexity
Technical issues due to integration with existing systems
